alert.note: Alert for Greene; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 1:40AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Owen and northeastern Greene Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 139 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bloomfield, or 23 miles west of Bloomington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Owen and northeastern Greene Counties, including the following locations... Worthington and Solsberry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EDT for south central, southwestern and west central Indiana.
